internal.detail: I performed maintenance tasks for the internal management web system. I have participated on the development of internal query system and I also worked on technical support tasks.

intern.detail: I worked providing consulting services to potential clients of the company.

development.detail: I worked providing consulting services to potential clients of the company. I have collaborated as one of the main developers in the internal libraries of the organization. Participate in the analysis, design and development of applications for the company's clients of which I can name: “Alitas del Cadillac“, “Sande Flowers“ and “Uncle Sam“. Also provide outsourcing services for Bagó laboratories in their reimbursement and expense system.
